name: Shadowblade (legallydistinct)
description:
STORY

You are a shadow mage, ascending through a nightmarish tower built upon the bodies of innocent sacrifices. You must defeat the lost souls that pursue you to create keys, which you then use to unlock access to the next floor. How far will you make it?

A first-person arena shooter with horror, fantasy and platforming elements combined to create a unique atmospheric experience.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Dash: Shift
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Interact: E
  • Pause Menu: ESC

Proceed through each floor, eliminating the enemies that spawn to confront you, in order to create a key that you then bring to the elevator in order to advance to the next floor. Continue on until each floor is completed.

DEVELOPMENT
